verbose_text: As such, vFLIP can inhibit extrinsic death-receptor-mediated apoptosis pathway by preventing the activation of caspases, including caspase 8, and additionally associates with the IKK complex and heat shock protein 90 (HSP90) to induce the expression of anti-apoptotic proteins via the activation of NF-kappaB.
